data.rationale:
Math::Thompson is a module that calculates the cardinality of the
    ball with radius 'n' on Thompson Group F. The problem of determine
    how much these balls grow can help to solve the question of whether
    Thompson group F is amenable or not.

    This work is related with my BS thesis. More information about
    Thompson groups and amenability can be found on:

    http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thompson_groups
    http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amenable_group
